div.a: Webinars About Applying for Financial Aid

span.strong: Parents of Students Applying for College

span.p:
Representatives from the Pennsylvania Higher Education Agency (PHEAA) will be providing an overview of how to apply for all types of financial aid, including completing the Free Application for Federal Student Aid (FAFSA), which is required to determine eligibility for most student aid programs such as the Pennsylvania State Grant, Federal Pell Grant, institutional offers, and federal student and parent loans.
Click Hereto register for the May 7 webinar from 6-7 pm
Click Hereto register for the May 14 webinar from 6-7 pm
Click Hereto register for the May 21 webinar from 6-7 pm

a.title: Click to read more about: Board Meeting 4/27/2020

span.font: Earlier today (April 9th, 2020), Governor Wolf and Secretary of Education Rivera closed PA schools through the end of the 2019-20 academic year, as defined by our local school calendar. This means we will be continuing with our virtual planned instruction. They closed the school buildings but did not discontinue the educational process. All students are expected to show a good faith effort in their classes/subjects by logging in, attending meetings, participating and completing assignments. The last student day for the 2019-20 school year is expected to be June 5, 2020.

span.p: Millville Area School District will be feeding our students ages 18 and younger for free during this mandated closure.

span.span: Lunch Distribution for the Weeks of April 20th, 27th, May 4th, 11th, 18th, 25th and June 1st

p.br:
Lunches will be distributed on Monday and Thursday only, except for the Week of May 25th, distribution will be Tuesday and Thursday (because of the holiday on Monday May 25th)
Each of the 2 days will provide you with 3 breakfasts and 3 lunches.
Distribution is from 11:00-12:00 at Jerseytown Community Center, LJ's Corner Market in Rohrsburg, and the bus lane of the elementary school.

span.p: If you have any questions or additional needs, please contact the elementary school at 570-458-5538 ext 1001.
Please do not get out of your car, as we have people who will deliver the food to you. Thank You.

a.title: Click to read more about: Kindergarten Screenings Postponed

div.a: Read More about Kindergarten Screenings Postponed
A Note From Our Athletic Director

span.p: This is a message for the Juniors and Seniors about prom. In order to try to provide this special occasion that occurs at the end of the year, we have tentatively rescheduled the prom for Monday, August 3rd, from 5:00-9:00 PM at The Barn at Greenwood in Iola. We are looking into having it catered.

We are hopeful that the prom will be held, but it is a tentative plan and a final decision will be based on the large gathering guidelines we receive from the Governor for the month of August.
We are in this together! Take care!
Check out the flyer for details how to register!

p.span: Atlantic Broadband has introduced Atlantic Broadband Internet Assist for a limited time for residents in need in its service areas who do not presently have internet with Atlantic Broadband. The new 15 x 1 Mbps service, normally priced at $9.99 per month plus taxes, will be offered free for 60 days. New Atlantic Broadband Internet Assist customers also will receive free installation and a free modem with the service.Those interested in the Internet Assist service should contact Atlantic Broadband at(888) 536-9600.

span.strong: For the remainder of this school closure, students will be assigned academic work Monday -Thursday with Fridays being a flexible day. There will be no additional work assigned to accommodate for FLEX Fridays. Here is what FLEX Fridays are for:

strong.span: Friday can be used as a catch up day, making connections with any teachers you may need support from.

span.strong: Parents and students will have time to spend in nature, go on a virtual field trip, whatever you plan as a family.

span.span: We cant wait to see how you use your FLEX Fridays!

div.a: Students, we miss you! Check out this message from the High School Teachers and Staff!

p.font: Click here to view the Millville-continuity of education plan submission PDF

span.p: Please be aware that the Senior Class trip scheduled for April 30-May 2, 2020 has been cancelled.
